title: Tim Ahrens
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809013217/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809013217/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Tim Ahrens**

Born: Heidelberg, [Germany](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809013217/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Germany), 1976.

Tim Ahrens has studied architecture at the University of Karlsruhe and Typeface Design in Reading. He works as a type designer and architect. In 2000 [Linotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809013217/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Linotype) published his sans serif text face [Aroma](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809013217/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Aroma). In 2005 he founded [Just Another Foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809013217/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Just%20Another%20Foundry), which distributes his display faces [Mashine](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809013217/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Mashine) and [Zalamander](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809013217/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Zalamander), the sans serif [Facit](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809013217/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Facit) and [Lapture](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809013217/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Lapture), a revival and redesign of [Albert Kapr](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809013217/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Albert%20Kapr)'s [Leipziger Antiqua](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809013217/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Leipziger%20Antiqua).
author: Tim Ahrens
